title: Suspended Account
body:
So yesterday my account was hacked and moved to Russian server.. I changed my password and I submitted a request for that and my account is back in EUNE now but it says that I'm permanently suspended and to check my email for more info. 
I don't have anything about this case in my email so I hope someone tells me whats going on soon...

replies.body: It looks like the account was locked for protection, and the email intended to inform you.  Hit us up in a [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and input an email address you currently have access to.  Our account recovery team can look into this for you and help restore access and make reparations.  We'll see you there!
